title: MoonRise Transparency
intro: Here there is no empty talk. Every line, every block, every address exists to prove: MoonRise is real execution, visible and auditable. This tab is the mirror of our commitment to those who build with us. No promises. Only delivery.

protection.summary: MoonRise protects the economy with logic, code, and automated shielding. Every operation respects limits, applies cooldowns, prevents abuse, and turns every action into real liquidity ‚Äî fueling the system, blocking manipulation, and making everything visible in real time.
protection.internalEconomy: Every movement inside the MoonRise ecosystem automatically feeds liquidity. Nothing is static. Every click strengthens the system and powers the financial engine we are building ‚Äî automated, transparent, and scalable.

dna: ‚úÖ Open-source code and auditable contracts ‚Äî anyone can verify everything directly on BscScan. Zero centralized control.
‚úÖ Every movement feeds the ecosystem ‚Äî no promises of external backing, only verifiable internal structure.
‚úÖ 100% sovereign ‚Äî no dependence on banks, companies, or third parties. Control is ours. Execution too.
‚úÖ Active anti-whale defense ‚Äî the system blocks suspicious moves to protect holders and the chart.
proof_intro: We don‚Äôt ask for trust. We show execution. Everything here can be tracked in real time via blockchain, images, contracts, and public documents.
proof: üî• Burn of 1.6 billion tokens at deploy ‚Äî visible on BscScan with public hash.
üõ†Ô∏è Public visible infrastructure ‚Äî contracts, fees, wallets, and documented operations.
üìÑ Presale in autonomous contract ‚Äî no manual control, fixed rules in the code.
üßæ Public wallets with tracking ‚Äî marketing, liquidity, rewards. Everything visible, nothing hidden.
patrimonio_desc: MoonRise is not just crypto. It‚Äôs code, it‚Äôs network, it‚Äôs real infrastructure built with discipline and strategic reinvestment. Every fee goes back into the system. Every click fuels the empire. Nothing comes from outside. Everything is born within.
wallets_desc: All addresses below are part of MoonRise‚Äôs public infrastructure. They are trackable, verifiable, and visible in real time on the blockchain.
wallets_locked_note: Wallet locked for 1 year after deploy

governance.title: Temporary and Transparent Governance
governance.intro: During the presale phase, the contract is controlled by a visible and limited owner ‚Äî with the sole objective of protecting the integrity of the initial operation.

can.title: What the owner CAN do
items: Pause and resume the contract in case of attack

cannot.title: What the owner CANNOT do
items: Bypass limits defined in the contract

lock_reason.title: Why are tokens locked?
lock_reason.paragraph_1: Liquidity, marketing, development, and reserve tokens are protected by time locks via the MasterVault contract. This ensures no funds are used prematurely, protecting the project‚Äôs economy and preventing abuse, diversion, or early moves.
lock_reason.paragraph_2: The contract is public, auditable, and immutable. You can verify every line directly on the blockchain:

ops.title: MoonRise Operation
ops.body: Our infrastructure is public and auditable: open contracts, official wallets, and execution rules visible in real time. We don‚Äôt depend on third-party custody or manual controls. Every relevant movement leaves an on-chain trail.

liquidity.title: Liquidity Policy & Market Defense
items: Liquidity opened in a controlled way, following a schedule and predefined rules.
Anti-whale and anti-dump mechanisms in the contract to protect holders and the chart.
Ecosystem fees and operations recorded on-chain (BscScan) with transparency.
Stability fund and automated locks via MasterVault.
